handler.launchRequest.welcomeText.cardCo:
You can ask me anything.

Latest features:
- Anthropic support (claude-3-5)
- Integration of Web-Search. The skill now has the ability to perform a web search when being asked for current information. Furthermore, this can also be explicitly requested, e.g. say 'Search the web for ...'.
handler.launchRequest.error.noUserId.spe: No userId was found in Alexa request.
handler.launchRequest.error.couldNotCrea: User account data could not be created. This is required to store up to 3 messages for your GPT context.
User account mapping could not be created. This is required to allow you to set up your own API Key. Please try again or contact the developer.
handler.launchRequest.error.couldNotFina: User registration could not be completed. This is required to allow you to set up your own API Key. Please try again or contact the developer.
handler.help.text.speechText: You can ask me anything you want. I can also understand follow up questions. If you want to use your own OpenAI API key or change the GPT model, say 'registration'. Do you want to try and ask me a question?
handler.help.repromptText.speechText: What do you want to ask?
handler.registration.successInfo.speechT: You can set up your own API Key at https://link.pinguincloud.de<say-as interpret-as='spell-out'>/ama-en</say-as>. Use the following credentials: Username: <prosody rate='x-slow'><say-as interpret-as='spell-out'>{username}</say-as></prosody>, Password: <prosody rate='x-slow'><say-as interpret-as='spell-out'>{password}</say-as></prosody>. If this was too fast, use another device with a display, like the Alexa App on your mobile phone and say: 'registration', again. The skill will now close to invalidate your current session.
handler.error.text.speechText: Sorry, I don't understand your command.
handler.error.text.cardTitle: Sorry, I don't understand your command.
handler.error.text.cardContent: Sorry, I don't understand your command.
handler.askQuestion.quotaReached.speechT: You have reached your usage quota for this month. To continue using the skill, feel free to set up your own API key by saying 'registration' and following the instructions.
